text: @nicki_e16 @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency As with any parameter, unusual results would be investigated and remedial action undertaken.¬†With regard to PFAS we have more recently started method development for this group of chemicals and can again detect to 0.1 ¬µg/l

@nicki_e16 @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency There is currently no regulatory requirement to monitor for PFOS and PFOA in final treated drinking water.¬†However, we do monitor for parameters in raw and final waters where there is a potential risk.¬†Our method can detect anything down to 0.1 ¬µg/l (microgrammes per litre).
